extraction_rules.description: translate all visits with time indicators as follow-up {number} month

all.description:
Instructions:
You are tasked with extracting medical information from the provided text which can inlcude patient information such demographics, diagnosis, treatmeents, medical background,  health care encounters, Visit detils, etc. 
Response Format: Provide your responses in a structured JSON format, including fields for 'domain', 'base_entity', 'additional_entities', 'unit', and 'categories' where applicable
